#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int n,m;
	cin>>m>>n;
	int arr[m];
	long long sum =0;
	for(int i =0;i<m;i++){
		cin>>arr[i];
		sum+=arr[i];
	}
	if(sum<n){
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
	else{
		sort(arr,arr+m);
		sum-=arr[m-1];
		if(sum>=(arr[m-1]-1)){
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		}
		else{
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
